mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PRODUCT_IN ( product_id, price, amount, identify_type, identify_id, manufactor_id, in_type_id, create_user_id ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{identifyType}, #{identifyId}, #{manufactorId}, #{inTypeId}, #{createUserId} )
mapper.select: SELECT productIn.id,product.brand_id,brand.name brand_name,product.id product_id,product.product_no,product.product_name,tech.id tech_id,tech.name tech_name,thickness.id thickness_id,thickness.name thickness_name,productIn.amount amount,product.price,manufactor.id manufactor_id, manufactor.name manufactor_name,productIn.identify_type,identify.id identify_id,identify.name identify_name, productIn.create_time,user.id user_id,user.username user_name,inType.id in_type_id,inType.name in_type_name FROM t_product_in productIn LEFT JOIN t_product product ON productIn.product_id = product.id LEFT JOIN t_brand brand ON product.brand_id = brand.id LEFT JOIN t_tech tech ON product.tech_id = tech.id LEFT JOIN t_thickness thickness ON product.thickness_id = thickness.id LEFT JOIN t_manufactor manufactor ON productIn.manufactor_id = manufactor.id LEFT JOIN t_identify identify ON productIn.identify_id = identify.id LEFT JOIN t_user user on user.id = productIn.create_user_id LEFT JOIN t_in_type inType on inType.id = productIn.in_type_id order by productIn.create_time desc
